name: BCardSection
desc: BOA Card Section layout component. It provides card alignment and transition between mobile and desktop.

infoArray.name: thresholdWidth
infoArray.desc: Max width for full scattered card panel.

infoArray.name: thresholdColumnCount
infoArray.desc: Max column count for full scattered card panel.

infoArray.name: contentAlignMode
infoArray.desc: Alignment mode of cards; it provides multi-column, single-column and mobile modes for cards. Default ContentAlignMode.MULTI.

infoArray.name: enableSortOnMobile
infoArray.desc: Cards sorted by given order in mobil
